loops_max: Maximum number of loops have been performed
loops-config-countlimit: Configuration variable defining maximum allowed number of loops ('-1' => no limit). '#forargs' and '#fornumargs' are not limited by this.
loops-config-enabledfunctions: Allows to define which functionalities provided by 'Loops' should be enabled for the wiki. If extension 'Variables' is not installed, '#loop', '#forargs' and '#fornumargs' will be disabled automatically.
